list_of_reviews.review: The worst support ever!P2P transaction was failed and they blocked my withdrawals. Its almost one month that I am waiting and the customer service sent me an email that we are busy and you need to wait!! How long can a customer in crypto world wait and see?? I am with Kucoin for almost 2 years now but now I really understand what people say about not trusting them.

list_of_reviews.review_title: KuCoin stole all my NEBL token
list_of_reviews.review: KuCoin stole all my NEBL token. Of course they say they delisted them, but I never received an e-mail. NEBL token don't just disappear 'magically' from your exchange wallet. So either they are still there or you sold them. Either way there is still my money around and you could either send me the token to my external wallet or send me the US$ or BTC which you received from selling. But till now they seem to not be willing to do anything to compensate me. This is stealing. Avoid this exchange!

list_of_reviews.review_title: SCAM, as asking for trade pasword you never set up
list_of_reviews.review: I am not able to withdraw even very litle amount as I do not have trade pin/pasword...really >?Wait but I never set up any trade pasword or PIN, only login pasword. But for deposit they didnt asked any pin, neither set up neiter crate any trade pasword.But to withdraw SURE you dont have paswords you never set up ...THATS just a sheer SCAM

The worst support ever! Case: P2P order closed while I was transferring the fiat payment to merchant. When I returned to the order, it was closed and I couldn't approve my fiat money transferring. I contacted with merchant and she has approved she's got my money on her bank account. The support suggested to the merchant to send back fiat money to me, but merchant couldn't do this because of bank transaction restriction. The only way to solve this was to release crypto from her account to my. The merchant told that kucoin has internal ID for this type of transaction and that she already did such operation and it takes about 30 minutes. After that support asked the merchant to prepare certain USDT amount on her account and just disappeared! I've been waiting 3 days and nobody can tell me why it takes so long! Both of sides have agreement, the merchant account is blocked, crypto is frozen. The only thing they has to do – to send blocked crypto to me! Also they blocked me in their telegram group once I started to claim there :(

Worst customer service ever. I signed up to trade on KuCoin mid January 2024. I’ve inquired about my verification status numerous times. Each time I get the same response. “Your documents have been well received …”Blah blah blah. Pretty they have bots responding automatically. We’re now mid April and my status has not changed nor have they responded any differently. Ridiculous. I have given up at this point.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Don't trust KuCoin with your funds!
list_of_reviews.review: I have been using KuCoin for a couple of year and thought they where a reliable marketplace, but unfortunately they are not.I did not login to my account for nearly a year during the bear market, but when I did I found that one of my main assets (FKX) were missing from my account. Apparently KuCoin decided to delist FKX, but did not feel the need to contact me about it to let me know. Instead they only made an announcement on their own website and after I did not withdrew my assets within their timespan, they claimed that I had forfeited the funds and took them for them selves. It would have taken just one text, email or phone call and I would have withdrawn the funds immediately. They know exactly how to reach you if they have a new listing or promotion, but when they decide to delist a token then they suddenly don't have your contact information available.I can only guess the reason behind this, but if you think of it than is does make a great business model to 'steal' the funds of the people that trusted you to safely hold them. Please be warned and watch out with whom you do business. There are more reliable marketplaces out there!#StaySafe #Frauds

list_of_reviews.review_title: Avoid this exchange please. Very dodgy..
list_of_reviews.review: Worst customer service I’ve ever encountered. I genuinely think this exchange is run by children. So unprofessional. Emails never answered, chat is with robotic answers and legally they don’t provide information you should know as investors. Please please avoid

list_of_reviews.review_title: Tried two times to send fiat money to…
list_of_reviews.review: Tried two times to send fiat money to my new account. Two times it was denied by kucoin. There was absolutely no information by kucoin why they didn't accept the money and sent it back. Customer agents in chat have no information and also can't offer any help. First customer agent said pls send less money. Result:also unsuccessful. Second time - within 24hours an expert will contact you. Result: no help - no contact. The customer service is TERRIBLE!!!!!!!!!

Becareful people kucoin exchange cheated me and stole all my money ,it manipulated on my account after i had deposited amount of Usdt then i tried to buy crypto on spot trading ,i found my balance not exist nor i could buy any crypto ! It's very awful and bad experience ever in exchange world! Not recommended to anyone!

Stay away. Customer Service is joke . Worst CS experience I ever had. Incompetent of fixing issues. Their ability seem limited to advising you how to solve it your self. Imagine one day you have an issue and you can not fix. My issue was that the isolated margin borrow & repay transaction history export did not include transactions. Could not file my taxes right.
Ive been using kucoin for a long time to trade low cap crypto coins. It works just fine. Its a little bit more expensive to use than binance but I like it very good.

Just f****** fantastic!!!! KuCoin has grown on me hard and I am kicking myself for leaving it until now, to fully immerse my time in the experience KuCoin has to offer. All the parts that are enjoyed amongst different exchanges, have been brought together for a more complete trading platform. No issues for me thus far... The challenging thing though is to navigate your way through the fully loaded platform which takes some time. Effort + Efficiency = $$$$$$Keep it up there humans!!! Please don't be in the news soon with legal issues. My heart will be broken.

I'm using this exchange for 2 years now (beside others). There was no problem during that time.The only drawback i experienced, the spam emails. I asked the customer support to stop sending any kind of marketing email to me. They suggested that I should mark them as spam, because there is no option to opt-out. No other experience with customer support.

list_of_reviews.review_title: KuCoin stole all my NEBL token
list_of_reviews.review: KuCoin stole all my NEBL token. Of course they say they delisted them, but I never received an e-mail. NEBL token don't just disappear 'magically' from your exchange wallet. So either they are still there or you sold them. Either way there is still my money around and you could either send me the token to my external wallet or send me the US$ or BTC which you received from selling. But till now they seem to not be willing to do anything to compensate me. This is stealing. Avoid this exchange!

list_of_reviews.review_title: SCAM, as asking for trade pasword you never set up
list_of_reviews.review: I am not able to withdraw even very litle amount as I do not have trade pin/pasword...really >?Wait but I never set up any trade pasword or PIN, only login pasword. But for deposit they didnt asked any pin, neither set up neiter crate any trade pasword.But to withdraw SURE you dont have paswords you never set up ...THATS just a sheer SCAM

Worst customer service ever. I signed up to trade on KuCoin mid January 2024. I’ve inquired about my verification status numerous times. Each time I get the same response. “Your documents have been well received …”Blah blah blah. Pretty they have bots responding automatically. We’re now mid April and my status has not changed nor have they responded any differently. Ridiculous. I have given up at this point.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Watch out from Trading bots; they may not exactly do what you expect...
list_of_reviews.review: Been a user of KuCoin for a long time, unfortunately I am starting to doubt the reliability of the future's bot. I had a VRA entry of 0.0073 and set the tp to 0.008222; the service indicates it was tp'd, however, the price never reached that area and my bot was closed; It happened 3 times already with similar issues and customer service is not being very useful or knowing how to help. Bot ID: 1452428525692232

The worst support ever! Case: P2P order closed while I was transferring the fiat payment to merchant. When I returned to the order, it was closed and I couldn't approve my fiat money transferring. I contacted with merchant and she has approved she's got my money on her bank account. The support suggested to the merchant to send back fiat money to me, but merchant couldn't do this because of bank transaction restriction. The only way to solve this was to release crypto from her account to my. The merchant told that kucoin has internal ID for this type of transaction and that she already did such operation and it takes about 30 minutes. After that support asked the merchant to prepare certain USDT amount on her account and just disappeared! I've been waiting 3 days and nobody can tell me why it takes so long! Both of sides have agreement, the merchant account is blocked, crypto is frozen. The only thing they has to do – to send blocked crypto to me! Also they blocked me in their telegram group once I started to claim there :(

I have moved to another country and sent an email to kucoin support so I can send in my new ID for verification and yet they now REFUSED me from signing into my account and showed "verification failed or expired".Are you becoming like FTX now?? So poor that you need to steal and right out scamming?

list_of_reviews.review_title: Tried two times to send fiat money to…
list_of_reviews.review: Tried two times to send fiat money to my new account. Two times it was denied by kucoin. There was absolutely no information by kucoin why they didn't accept the money and sent it back. Customer agents in chat have no information and also can't offer any help. First customer agent said pls send less money. Result:also unsuccessful. Second time - within 24hours an expert will contact you. Result: no help - no contact. The customer service is TERRIBLE!!!!!!!!!

list_of_reviews.review_title: Don't trust KuCoin with your funds!
list_of_reviews.review: I have been using KuCoin for a couple of year and thought they where a reliable marketplace, but unfortunately they are not.I did not login to my account for nearly a year during the bear market, but when I did I found that one of my main assets (FKX) were missing from my account. Apparently KuCoin decided to delist FKX, but did not feel the need to contact me about it to let me know. Instead they only made an announcement on their own website and after I did not withdrew my assets within their timespan, they claimed that I had forfeited the funds and took them for them selves. It would have taken just one text, email or phone call and I would have withdrawn the funds immediately. They know exactly how to reach you if they have a new listing or promotion, but when they decide to delist a token then they suddenly don't have your contact information available.I can only guess the reason behind this, but if you think of it than is does make a great business model to 'steal' the funds of the people that trusted you to safely hold them. Please be warned and watch out with whom you do business. There are more reliable marketplaces out there!#StaySafe #Frauds
Worst customer service ever.  P2p order is in appeal for 48 hours and nothing been done.  Chat service is ignoring me now

Becareful people kucoin exchange cheated me and stole all my money ,it manipulated on my account after i had deposited amount of Usdt then i tried to buy crypto on spot trading ,i found my balance not exist nor i could buy any crypto ! It's very awful and bad experience ever in exchange world! Not recommended to anyone!

list_of_reviews.review_title: P2p dispute for about 18 days now
list_of_reviews.review: P2p dispute for about 18 days now,  they refuse  to release  my coin. I regret  ever trying on kucoun.

Stay away. Customer Service is joke . Worst CS experience I ever had. Incompetent of fixing issues. Their ability seem limited to advising you how to solve it your self. Imagine one day you have an issue and you can not fix. My issue was that the isolated margin borrow & repay transaction history export did not include transactions. Could not file my taxes right.

Just f****** fantastic!!!! KuCoin has grown on me hard and I am kicking myself for leaving it until now, to fully immerse my time in the experience KuCoin has to offer. All the parts that are enjoyed amongst different exchanges, have been brought together for a more complete trading platform. No issues for me thus far... The challenging thing though is to navigate your way through the fully loaded platform which takes some time. Effort + Efficiency = $$$$$$Keep it up there humans!!! Please don't be in the news soon with legal issues. My heart will be broken.

Kucoin has definitely some high potential coins for big gains. Improved massively with new interface. Their fees are also comparable with some of the exchanges top 1 tier. Lot of unnecessary emails and are quite annoying without unsubscribing. Had lot of issues with support and every time they said to stay in line. Withdraws took about few hours and unfortunately missed some high opportunities for profit.Hope it will be changed and fixed

I signed up on the platform, made deposits but on unable to withdraw. Contacted the customer care, he said I will have to wait for 24hrs because I set up security which their system insisted that I do before making deposits. This is a bad of mode of operations. It only makes sense if account is restricted if there's security change but for settings up security, it doesn't make sense at all. I have lost business deal because of this stupid policy.

Instead they only made an announcement on their own website and after I did not withdrew my assets within their timespan, they claimed that I had forfeited the funds and took them for them selves. It would have taken just one text, email or phone call and I would have withdrawn the funds immediately. They know exactly how to reach you if they have a new listing or promotion, but when they decide to delist a token then they suddenly don't have your contact information available.I can only guess the reason behind this, but if you think of it than is does make a great business model to 'steal' the funds of the people that trusted you to safely hold them. Please be warned and watch out with whom you do business. There are more reliable marketplaces out there!#StaySafe #Frauds

list_of_reviews.review_title: A Disheartening Journey to Access My Funds
list_of_reviews.review: For over 5 months, I've been caught in an exhausting loop trying to resolve what seemed like a simple issue with my account, which holds a substantial amount of USDT.Initially, I had faith in KuCoin's support system to promptly address and fix my problem. However, my situation has only become a testament to the painfully slow and ineffective customer service response.Each interaction with support has been met with prolonged delays, leaving me without access to my funds. Their communication strikes me as dismissive and lacking in urgency, as my repeated requests for escalation have gone unheeded. The irony of it all – the automated messages boast of a seamless support experience, yet my reality couldn't be further from that promise.The absence of a resolution and inaccessibility of my assets have led to mounting frustrations. It's hard not to feel that my funds are being held without justification, stirring a worrying notion that they may never intend to resolve the issue – almost as if they're willing to let my USDT slip through the cracks.In all seriousness, this ordeal has left a sour taste in my mouth, and I question the integrity of a service that can so easily disregard the concerns and rights of its users. The thought of my hard-earned money being cavalierly treated by KuCoin is unsettling, to say the least.To anyone considering KuCoin as their trading platform, I urge you to proceed with caution. The features and tools offered mean little if, in the end, access to your funds is compromised by inadequate customer support.

The worst support ever!P2P transaction was failed and they blocked my withdrawals. I am with Kucoin for almost 2 years now but now I really understand what people say about not trusting them.

list_of_reviews.review_title: A Disheartening Journey to Access My Funds
list_of_reviews.review: For over 5 months, I've been caught in an exhausting loop trying to resolve what seemed like a simple issue with my account, which holds a substantial amount of USDT.Initially, I had faith in KuCoin's support system to promptly address and fix my problem. However, my situation has only become a testament to the painfully slow and ineffective customer service response.Each interaction with support has been met with prolonged delays, leaving me without access to my funds. Their communication strikes me as dismissive and lacking in urgency, as my repeated requests for escalation have gone unheeded. The irony of it all – the automated messages boast of a seamless support experience, yet my reality couldn't be further from that promise.The absence of a resolution and inaccessibility of my assets have led to mounting frustrations. It's hard not to feel that my funds are being held without justification, stirring a worrying notion that they may never intend to resolve the issue – almost as if they're willing to let my USDT slip through the cracks.In all seriousness, this ordeal has left a sour taste in my mouth, and I question the integrity of a service that can so easily disregard the concerns and rights of its users. The thought of my hard-earned money being cavalierly treated by KuCoin is unsettling, to say the least.To anyone considering KuCoin as their trading platform, I urge you to proceed with caution. The features and tools offered mean little if, in the end, access to your funds is compromised by inadequate customer support.

The worst support ever!P2P transaction was failed and they blocked my withdrawals. Its almost one month that I am waiting and the customer service sent me an email that we are busy and you need to wait!! How long can a customer in crypto world wait and see?? I am with Kucoin for almost 2 years now but now I really understand what people say about not trusting them.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Watch out from Trading bots; they may not exactly do what you expect...
list_of_reviews.review: Been a user of KuCoin for a long time, unfortunately I am starting to doubt the reliability of the future's bot. I had a VRA entry of 0.0073 and set the tp to 0.008222; the service indicates it was tp'd, however, the price never reached that area and my bot was closed; It happened 3 times already with similar issues and customer service is not being very useful or knowing how to help. Bot ID: 1452428525692232

Worst customer service ever. I signed up to trade on KuCoin mid January 2024. I’ve inquired about my verification status numerous times. Each time I get the same response. “Your documents have been well received …”Blah blah blah. Pretty they have bots responding automatically. We’re now mid April and my status has not changed nor have they responded any differently. Ridiculous. I have given up at this point.

list_of_reviews.review_title: KuCoin stole all my NEBL token
list_of_reviews.review: KuCoin stole all my NEBL token. Of course they say they delisted them, but I never received an e-mail. NEBL token don't just disappear 'magically' from your exchange wallet. So either they are still there or you sold them. Either way there is still my money around and you could either send me the token to my external wallet or send me the US$ or BTC which you received from selling. But till now they seem to not be willing to do anything to compensate me. This is stealing. Avoid this exchange!

list_of_reviews.review_title: SCAM, as asking for trade pasword you never set up
list_of_reviews.review: I am not able to withdraw even very litle amount as I do not have trade pin/pasword...really >?Wait but I never set up any trade pasword or PIN, only login pasword. But for deposit they didnt asked any pin, neither set up neiter crate any trade pasword.But to withdraw SURE you dont have paswords you never set up ...THATS just a sheer SCAM

The worst support ever! Case: P2P order closed while I was transferring the fiat payment to merchant. When I returned to the order, it was closed and I couldn't approve my fiat money transferring. I contacted with merchant and she has approved she's got my money on her bank account. The support suggested to the merchant to send back fiat money to me, but merchant couldn't do this because of bank transaction restriction. The only way to solve this was to release crypto from her account to my. The merchant told that kucoin has internal ID for this type of transaction and that she already did such operation and it takes about 30 minutes. After that support asked the merchant to prepare certain USDT amount on her account and just disappeared! I've been waiting 3 days and nobody can tell me why it takes so long! Both of sides have agreement, the merchant account is blocked, crypto is frozen. The only thing they has to do – to send blocked crypto to me! Also they blocked me in their telegram group once I started to claim there :(

I have moved to another country and sent an email to kucoin support so I can send in my new ID for verification and yet they now REFUSED me from signing into my account and showed "verification failed or expired".Are you becoming like FTX now?? So poor that you need to steal and right out scamming?

list_of_reviews.review_title: Avoid this exchange please. Very dodgy..

list_of_reviews.review_title: Tried two times to send fiat money to…

There was absolutely no information by kucoin why they didn't accept the money and sent it back. Customer agents in chat have no information and also can't offer any help. First customer agent said pls send less money. Result:also unsuccessful. Second time - within 24hours an expert will contact you. Result: no help - no contact. The customer service is TERRIBLE!!!!!!!!!

A frustrating mess. The simple things, a list of all profits/losses is extremely difficult. Ive been using Trading View for a while now, theres a reason everyone bangs on about how good it is. Avoid Kucoin if you can. Im in the Telegram support channle and theyre about as useless as the App

It's very awful and bad experience ever in exchange world! Not recommended to anyone!

Stay away. Customer Service is joke . Worst CS experience I ever had. Incompetent of fixing issues. Their ability seem limited to advising you how to solve it your self. list_of_reviews.review: Can I ask for a lawyer to take kucoin in court? Because are useless and full off incompetent that make money on your money.  That way they bloked our accounts.RUN RUN RUN

Kucoin has definitely some high potential coins for big gains. Improved massively with new interface. Their fees are also comparable with some of the exchanges top 1 tier. Lot of unnecessary emails and are quite annoying without unsubscribing. Had lot of issues with support and every time they said to stay in line. Withdraws took about few hours and unfortunately missed some high opportunities for profit.Hope it will be changed and fixed

Just f****** fantastic!!!! KuCoin has grown on me hard and I am kicking myself for leaving it until now, to fully immerse my time in the experience KuCoin has to offer. All the parts that are enjoyed amongst different exchanges, have been brought together for a more complete trading platform. No issues for me thus far... The challenging thing though is to navigate your way through the fully loaded platform which takes some time. Effort + Efficiency = $$$$$$Keep it up there humans!!! Please don't be in the news soon with legal issues. My heart will be broken.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Don't trust KuCoin with your funds!
list_of_reviews.review: I have been using KuCoin for a couple of year and thought they where a reliable marketplace, but unfortunately they are not.I did not login to my account for nearly a year during the bear market, but when I did I found that one of my main assets (FKX) were missing from my account. Apparently KuCoin decided to delist FKX, but did not feel the need to contact me about it to let me know. Instead they only made an announcement on their own website and after I did not withdrew my assets within their timespan, they claimed that I had forfeited the funds and took them for them selves. It would have taken just one text, email or phone call and I would have withdrawn the funds immediately. They know exactly how to reach you if they have a new listing or promotion, but when they decide to delist a token then they suddenly don't have your contact information available.I can only guess the reason behind this, but if you think of it than is does make a great business model to 'steal' the funds of the people that trusted you to safely hold them. Please be warned and watch out with whom you do business. There are more reliable marketplaces out there!#StaySafe #Frauds

I contacted with merchant and she has approved she's got my money on her bank account. The support suggested to the merchant to send back fiat money to me, but merchant couldn't do this because of bank transaction restriction. The only way to solve this was to release crypto from her account to my. The merchant told that kucoin has internal ID for this type of transaction and that she already did such operation and it takes about 30 minutes. After that support asked the merchant to prepare certain USDT amount on her account and just disappeared! I've been waiting 3 days and nobody can tell me why it takes so long! Both of sides have agreement, the merchant account is blocked, crypto is frozen. The only thing they has to do – to send blocked crypto to me! Also they blocked me in their telegram group once I started to claim there :(

It's very awful and bad experience ever in exchange world! Not recommended to anyone!

Kucoin has definitely some high potential coins for big gains. Improved massively with new interface. Their fees are also comparable with some of the exchanges top 1 tier. Lot of unnecessary emails and are quite annoying without unsubscribing. Had lot of issues with support and every time they said to stay in line. Withdraws took about few hours and unfortunately missed some high opportunities for profit.Hope it will be changed and fixed

Just f****** fantastic!!!! KuCoin has grown on me hard and I am kicking myself for leaving it until now, to fully immerse my time in the experience KuCoin has to offer. All the parts that are enjoyed amongst different exchanges, have been brought together for a more complete trading platform. No issues for me thus far... The challenging thing though is to navigate your way through the fully loaded platform which takes some time. Effort + Efficiency = $$$$$$Keep it up there humans!!! Please don't be in the news soon with legal issues. My heart will be broken.

Contacted the customer care, he said I will have to wait for 24hrs because I set up security which their system insisted that I do before making deposits. This is a bad of mode of operations. It only makes sense if account is restricted if there's security change but for settings up security, it doesn't make sense at all. I have lost business deal because of this stupid policy.

list_of_reviews.review_title: A Disheartening Journey to Access My Funds
list_of_reviews.review: For over 5 months, I've been caught in an exhausting loop trying to resolve what seemed like a simple issue with my account, which holds a substantial amount of USDT.Initially, I had faith in KuCoin's support system to promptly address and fix my problem. However, my situation has only become a testament to the painfully slow and ineffective customer service response.Each interaction with support has been met with prolonged delays, leaving me without access to my funds. Their communication strikes me as dismissive and lacking in urgency, as my repeated requests for escalation have gone unheeded. The irony of it all – the automated messages boast of a seamless support experience, yet my reality couldn't be further from that promise.The absence of a resolution and inaccessibility of my assets have led to mounting frustrations. It's hard not to feel that my funds are being held without justification, stirring a worrying notion that they may never intend to resolve the issue – almost as if they're willing to let my USDT slip through the cracks.In all seriousness, this ordeal has left a sour taste in my mouth, and I question the integrity of a service that can so easily disregard the concerns and rights of its users. The thought of my hard-earned money being cavalierly treated by KuCoin is unsettling, to say the least.To anyone considering KuCoin as their trading platform, I urge you to proceed with caution. The features and tools offered mean little if, in the end, access to your funds is compromised by inadequate customer support.

list_of_reviews.review: Been a user of KuCoin for a long time, unfortunately I am starting to doubt the reliability of the future's bot. I had a VRA entry of 0.0073 and set the tp to 0.008222; the service indicates it was tp'd, however, the price never reached that area and my bot was closed; It happened 3 times already with similar issues and customer service is not being very useful or knowing how to help. Bot ID: 1452428525692232

Worst customer service ever. I signed up to trade on KuCoin mid January 2024. I’ve inquired about my verification status numerous times. Each time I get the same response. “Your documents have been well received …”Blah blah blah. Pretty they have bots responding automatically. We’re now mid April and my status has not changed nor have they responded any differently. Ridiculous. I have given up at this point.

The worst support ever!P2P transaction was failed and they blocked my withdrawals. Its almost one month that I am waiting and the customer service sent me an email that we are busy and you need to wait!! How long can a customer in crypto world wait and see?? I am with Kucoin for almost 2 years now but now I really understand what people say about not trusting them.

list_of_reviews.review_title: A Disheartening Journey to Access My Funds
list_of_reviews.review: For over 5 months, I've been caught in an exhausting loop trying to resolve what seemed like a simple issue with my account, which holds a substantial amount of USDT.Initially, I had faith in KuCoin's support system to promptly address and fix my problem. However, my situation has only become a testament to the painfully slow and ineffective customer service response.Each interaction with support has been met with prolonged delays, leaving me without access to my funds. Their communication strikes me as dismissive and lacking in urgency, as my repeated requests for escalation have gone unheeded. The irony of it all – the automated messages boast of a seamless support experience, yet my reality couldn't be further from that promise.The absence of a resolution and inaccessibility of my assets have led to mounting frustrations. It's hard not to feel that my funds are being held without justification, stirring a worrying notion that they may never intend to resolve the issue – almost as if they're willing to let my USDT slip through the cracks.In all seriousness, this ordeal has left a sour taste in my mouth, and I question the integrity of a service that can so easily disregard the concerns and rights of its users. The thought of my hard-earned money being cavalierly treated by KuCoin is unsettling, to say the least.To anyone considering KuCoin as their trading platform, I urge you to proceed with caution. The features and tools offered mean little if, in the end, access to your funds is compromised by inadequate customer support.

list_of_reviews.review_title: SCAM, as asking for trade pasword you never set up
list_of_reviews.review: I am not able to withdraw even very litle amount as I do not have trade pin/pasword...really >?Wait but I never set up any trade pasword or PIN, only login pasword. But for deposit they didnt asked any pin, neither set up neiter crate any trade pasword.But to withdraw SURE you dont have paswords you never set up ...THATS just a sheer SCAM

I have moved to another country and sent an email to kucoin support so I can send in my new ID for verification and yet they now REFUSED me from signing into my account and showed "verification failed or expired".Are you becoming like FTX now?? So poor that you need to steal and right out scamming?

list_of_reviews.review_title: KuCoin stole all my NEBL token
list_of_reviews.review: KuCoin stole all my NEBL token. Of course they say they delisted them, but I never received an e-mail. NEBL token don't just disappear 'magically' from your exchange wallet. So either they are still there or you sold them. Either way there is still my money around and you could either send me the token to my external wallet or send me the US$ or BTC which you received from selling. But till now they seem to not be willing to do anything to compensate me. This is stealing. Avoid this exchange!

Kucoin has definitely some high potential coins for big gains. Improved massively with new interface. Their fees are also comparable with some of the exchanges top 1 tier. Lot of unnecessary emails and are quite annoying without unsubscribing. Had lot of issues with support and every time they said to stay in line. Withdraws took about few hours and unfortunately missed some high opportunities for profit.Hope it will be changed and fixed

Just f****** fantastic!!!! KuCoin has grown on me hard and I am kicking myself for leaving it until now, to fully immerse my time in the experience KuCoin has to offer. All the parts that are enjoyed amongst different exchanges, have been brought together for a more complete trading platform. No issues for me thus far... The challenging thing though is to navigate your way through the fully loaded platform which takes some time. Effort + Efficiency = $$$$$$Keep it up there humans!!! Please don't be in the news soon with legal issues. My heart will be broken.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Tried two times to send fiat money to…
list_of_reviews.review: Tried two times to send fiat money to my new account. Two times it was denied by kucoin. There was absolutely no information by kucoin why they didn't accept the money and sent it back. Customer agents in chat have no information and also can't offer any help. First customer agent said pls send less money. Result:also unsuccessful. Second time - within 24hours an expert will contact you. Result: no help - no contact. The customer service is TERRIBLE!!!!!!!!!

Each time I get the same response. “Your documents have been well received …”Blah blah blah. Pretty they have bots responding automatically. Just f****** fantastic!!!! KuCoin has grown on me hard and I am kicking myself for leaving it until now, to fully immerse my time in the experience KuCoin has to offer. I opened an account a few months ago and made a small deposit to activate it.I went through the KYC process a few times, and it wouldn't go through (it seemed to be automated online).After sending many emails, I received finally a reply that my account was not approved. Ok, fine, please send me back my money.Since then: no reply. They send me spam daily (impossible to opt out), but not a single reply to my dozen request to return my money.So as far as I am concerned, this is a scam site. They can refuse your application or just close your account and they will not answer any refund request.

Support is a nightmare. My account was hacked more than 2 months ago. I reported the problem. The account was closed. They asked for identification documents. I sent it. After 1 month, I received a mail, in which I did not receive a response for my problem, they just asked for the identification documents again. I sent it again. Again, 1 month passed when they answered. In this letter, only identification data was requested for the third time. I never get any other worthwhile answers.Update: I am now sure that they are playing with me on purpose. I send the data 2 days ago. Today I received an email again to send the data. They ask again for the fourth time.
This is a scam. Finish task 6 but that's it. After that, leave. Don't fall into the sunk cost fallacy. They will lure you into paying more until you can no longer pay.

I opened an account a few months ago and made a small deposit to activate it.I went through the KYC process a few times, and it wouldn't go through (it seemed to be automated online).After sending many emails, I received finally a reply that my account was not approved. Ok, fine, please send me back my money.Since then: no reply. They send me spam daily (impossible to opt out), but not a single reply to my dozen request to return my money.So as far as I am concerned, this is a scam site. They can refuse your application or just close your account and they will not answer any refund request.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Unlawful Fund Freezing and Poor Customer Support at KuCoin
list_of_reviews.review: I am writing this review to express my profound dissatisfaction with KuCoin Exchange. Despite being a KYC-verified user for over two years and a verified P2P merchant on the platform, KuCoin has unjustly frozen my funds and prevented me from making withdrawals. (ticket number: 4073423) KuCoin requested my identity documents even though my account has been verified for an extended period. Moreover, they demanded the source of my 3000 USDT deposit, which I had already explained as proceeds from selling my camera and receiving the payment in cryptocurrency. Despite providing this information, the support chat has been unresponsive and has refused to resolve the issue.From a legal perspective, KuCoin's actions raise serious concerns. According to international financial regulations and consumer protection laws, including the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) Article 5, financial institutions are required to handle customer data lawfully, fairly, and transparently. KuCoin’s arbitrary freezing of funds without adequate explanation or timely support violates these principles.Furthermore, under the principles of the Financial Action Task Force (FATF), which governs Anti-Money Laundering (AML) practices, customers who have completed KYC procedures should not face unwarranted obstructions in accessing their funds. KuCoin’s insistence on additional documentation and refusal to address my case in a timely manner contravenes these standards.In summary, KuCoin’s handling of my account has been deeply disappointing and legally questionable. I urge potential users to consider these issues before trusting their funds to this exchange.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Unreliable crypto exchange with poor customer service
list_of_reviews.review: Do not trust this crypto exchange. Without any form of warning, it is no longer possible to claim rewards already earned with crypto staking. They simply disable the feature and refuse to find a solution to pay out my earned tokens. Customer service does not answer your questions. No solution is offered. Wondering why the authorities aren't investigating this yet.

Support is a nightmare. My account was hacked more than 2 months ago. I reported the problem. The account was closed. They asked for identification documents. I sent it. After 1 month, I received a mail, in which I did not receive a response for my problem, they just asked for the identification documents again. I sent it again. Again, 1 month passed when they answered. In this letter, only identification data was requested for the third time. I never get any other worthwhile answers.Update: I am now sure that they are playing with me on purpose. I send the data 2 days ago. Today I received an email again to send the data. They ask again for the fourth time.

ret@rded site. during verificationi doesnt give choice for front or rear camera. retared. and they also mess up log  in and pass word fields. something a amateur in college wouldnt messe up. embarassing for a mega crypto coin site but this is crytpo all around full of idi0ts. and ret@rds. ANd NO SUPPORT .
This is a scam. Finish task 6 but that's it. After that, leave. Don't fall into the sunk cost fallacy. They will lure you into paying more until you can no longer pay.

Worst customer service ever. I signed up to trade on KuCoin mid January 2024. I’ve inquired about my verification status numerous times. Each time I get the same response. “Your documents have been well received …”Blah blah blah. Pretty they have bots responding automatically. We’re now mid April and my status has not changed nor have they responded any differently. Ridiculous. I have given up at this point.

Just f****** fantastic!!!! KuCoin has grown on me hard and I am kicking myself for leaving it until now, to fully immerse my time in the experience KuCoin has to offer. All the parts that are enjoyed amongst different exchanges, have been brought together for a more complete trading platform. No issues for me thus far... The challenging thing though is to navigate your way through the fully loaded platform which takes some time. Effort + Efficiency = $$$$$$Keep it up there humans!!! Please don't be in the news soon with legal issues. My heart will be broken.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Unlawful Fund Freezing and Poor Customer Support at KuCoin
list_of_reviews.review: I am writing this review to express my profound dissatisfaction with KuCoin Exchange. Despite being a KYC-verified user for over two years and a verified P2P merchant on the platform, KuCoin has unjustly frozen my funds and prevented me from making withdrawals. (ticket number: 4073423) KuCoin requested my identity documents even though my account has been verified for an extended period. Moreover, they demanded the source of my 3000 USDT deposit, which I had already explained as proceeds from selling my camera and receiving the payment in cryptocurrency. Despite providing this information, the support chat has been unresponsive and has refused to resolve the issue.From a legal perspective, KuCoin's actions raise serious concerns. According to international financial regulations and consumer protection laws, including the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) Article 5, financial institutions are required to handle customer data lawfully, fairly, and transparently. KuCoin’s arbitrary freezing of funds without adequate explanation or timely support violates these principles.Furthermore, under the principles of the Financial Action Task Force (FATF), which governs Anti-Money Laundering (AML) practices, customers who have completed KYC procedures should not face unwarranted obstructions in accessing their funds. KuCoin’s insistence on additional documentation and refusal to address my case in a timely manner contravenes these standards.In summary, KuCoin’s handling of my account has been deeply disappointing and legally questionable. I urge potential users to consider these issues before trusting their funds to this exchange.

list_of_reviews.review_title: During P2P arbitration this company has…
list_of_reviews.review: During P2P arbitration this company has been absolutely awful. They never solve anything just ask for more info. They send out pre written responses and barely look over the grievance. There's no customer support line either. I would avoid these worthless eaters.

Ticket email number: 4048607I would rate kucoin overall just like binance for 1 star. For blocking account for no reason and asking for many documents even tho I didn't do big transactions. I made some xmr deposits and they locked my withdrawals. Now few weeks and they request screenshots from wallet that these transactions were sent. It literally doesn't make sense.Avoid at all costs. There are better exchanges
my Kucoin account is hacked, I ask you for help several times with no response. I don't recommend Kucoin, it's not safe

DO NOT USE THIS SERVICEThey will take your money and make it next to impossible to get it out. Extortionate fees and lack of the most basic of services. Has to be the worst exchange in the market

list_of_reviews.review_title: I've been trying for 7 months now and…
list_of_reviews.review: I've been trying for 7 months now and get my money paid out they just keep asking me over and over and over to submit documents every time I submit they come up with new ridiculous excuses as to why it can't be done Stay far away

Account locked for no reason. To unlock they want ridiculous number of screenshots, video and other stuff.I have sent them a video of me with my id. I have access to email address, password, 2FA, phone, everything. But they still want me to send any random stuff that doesn't make any sense.To all the people thinking about to put money in Kucoin: DON'T DO IT!

Kucoin has interesting earning products but the customer support is a disaster. If you have assets there, pray you don't need their help then you have to forget about your assets.All of the customer support personnel are witless and dumb. When you reach online chat they answer you with hackneyed responses and direct you to submit a ticket and then leave the chat. The people who answer the tickets are also dimwitted and answer you with unrelated and irresponsible responses.

Warning ⚠️ ⚠️ ⚠️  scammers Best choice .P2P on kucoin is the worst of all . On purpose there appeals will take months and months to get your money released again from scammers hands .Scammers will use there accounts again and again without getting suspended or closed . Stttttaaay aawwwaay .

They are ridicolous. I opened the account and sent funds. After, I need to withdraw funds and they ask documents, authentications, new passwords, source of funds, KYC, bank statements.... otherwise funds remain sequestrated!!!!I am trying to give what they request, and I don't know what will happen but this is strongly unfair. What will happen if I cannot give them what they request? If they refuse my photo? Do they retain funds forever?If my situation is irregular or incomplete they must regularize it BEFORE receiving funds. After they receive funds, if something is missing, they can block new operations, BUT NOT WITHDRAWALS. THAT IS MY MONEY. They cannot sequestrate funds!!!!! Stay away!!!!
Horrible service. Top name solved my worries. Don't hesitate

Beware of this app!!! Protect your identity and please don’t do the KYC or deposit any money. This app is a drain. The customer support is like speaking to a wall. They either respond saying your issue is resolved even without resolving it and close the ticket indicating g no response. I had a hard time dealing with their support. I submitted my details nearly 4mnths ago and still the KYC is not done, which they claim should be done latest by 7 days. You can’t withdraw without KYC.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Worse customer support I have ever…
list_of_reviews.review: Worse customer support I have ever seen. My physical card is not working and I have been in contact with then for 3 weeks, every time they repeat their useless and irrelevant respond although they declare that they have checked what is the problem!Very low skill customer support!

list_of_reviews.review_title: Do you enjoy endless KYC games?
list_of_reviews.review: Do you enjoy jumping through endless KYC hoops? If so, Kucoin is the place for you. I had an account there for over 4 years until early 2024 when they implemented KYC-for-all, no exceptions. Had to submit multiple photos and videos to get my coins off the exchange. They will hold your coins hostage until you comply with their whims. My rating of them now: AVOID AT ALL COSTS!

list_of_reviews.review_title: Ive lost like 3 years ago my 2fa…
list_of_reviews.review: Ive lost like 3 years ago my 2fa indentification. I tryed many times to recover my account. I showed my passport aswell i know my log in. I offered them to show anything they want but they only accept a transfer code from another server. I dont know this and aswell most servers dont even exist anymore. Basically they steal my coins this way since they refuse to help me. Feels a bit criminal to me :(

list_of_reviews.review_title: This is the worst company ever.
list_of_reviews.review: This is the worst company ever.I contact them via chat they never reply but they say they opened a ticket.I talked with them via email, replying to them and the next morning they sent an email saying that they never hear back from me in the previous 72 hours, while it was the opposite and I was waiting for their answer. By the way, the 72 hours never passed.I am going to contact the European Consumer Centre for obtaining my bonuses

list_of_reviews.review_title: Unreliable crypto exchange with poor customer service
list_of_reviews.review: Do not trust this crypto exchange. Without any form of warning, it is no longer possible to claim rewards already earned with crypto staking. They simply disable the feature and refuse to find a solution to pay out my earned tokens. Customer service does not answer your questions. No solution is offered. Wondering why the authorities aren't investigating this yet.

I opened an account a few months ago and made a small deposit to activate it.I went through the KYC process a few times, and it wouldn't go through (it seemed to be automated online).After sending many emails, I received finally a reply that my account was not approved. Ok, fine, please send me back my money.Since then: no reply. They send me spam daily (impossible to opt out), but not a single reply to my dozen request to return my money.So as far as I am concerned, this is a scam site. They can refuse your application or just close your account and they will not answer any refund request.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Watch out from Trading bots; they may not exactly do what you expect...
list_of_reviews.review: Been a user of KuCoin for a long time, unfortunately I am starting to doubt the reliability of the future's bot. I had a VRA entry of 0.0073 and set the tp to 0.008222; the service indicates it was tp'd, however, the price never reached that area and my bot was closed; It happened 3 times already with similar issues and customer service is not being very useful or knowing how to help. Bot ID: 1452428525692232

Just f****** fantastic!!!! KuCoin has grown on me hard and I am kicking myself for leaving it until now, to fully immerse my time in the experience KuCoin has to offer. All the parts that are enjoyed amongst different exchanges, have been brought together for a more complete trading platform. No issues for me thus far... The challenging thing though is to navigate your way through the fully loaded platform which takes some time. Effort + Efficiency = $$$$$$Keep it up there humans!!! Please don't be in the news soon with legal issues. My heart will be broken.

list_of_reviews.review_title: I've been trying for 7 months now and…
list_of_reviews.review: I've been trying for 7 months now and get my money paid out they just keep asking me over and over and over to submit documents every time I submit they come up with new ridiculous excuses as to why it can't be done Stay far away

They are ridicolous. I opened the account and sent funds. After, I need to withdraw funds and they ask documents, authentications, new passwords, source of funds, KYC, bank statements.... otherwise funds remain sequestrated!!!!I am trying to give what they request, and I don't know what will happen but this is strongly unfair. What will happen if I cannot give them what they request? If they refuse my photo? Do they retain funds forever?If my situation is irregular or incomplete they must regularize it BEFORE receiving funds. After they receive funds, if something is missing, they can block new operations, BUT NOT WITHDRAWALS. THAT IS MY MONEY. They cannot sequestrate funds!!!!! Stay away!!!!

Beware of this app!!! Protect your identity and please don’t do the KYC or deposit any money. This app is a drain. The customer support is like speaking to a wall. They either respond saying your issue is resolved even without resolving it and close the ticket indicating g no response. I had a hard time dealing with their support. I submitted my details nearly 4mnths ago and still the KYC is not done, which they claim should be done latest by 7 days. You can’t withdraw without KYC.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Worse customer support I have ever…

list_of_reviews.review_title: Do you enjoy endless KYC games?
list_of_reviews.review: Do you enjoy jumping through endless KYC hoops? If so, Kucoin is the place for you. I had an account there for over 4 years until early 2024 when they implemented KYC-for-all, no exceptions. Had to submit multiple photos and videos to get my coins off the exchange. They will hold your coins hostage until you comply with their whims. My rating of them now: AVOID AT ALL COSTS!

list_of_reviews.review_title: Ive lost like 3 years ago my 2fa…
list_of_reviews.review: Ive lost like 3 years ago my 2fa indentification. I tryed many times to recover my account. I showed my passport aswell i know my log in. I offered them to show anything they want but they only accept a transfer code from another server. I dont know this and aswell most servers dont even exist anymore. Basically they steal my coins this way since they refuse to help me. Feels a bit criminal to me :(

list_of_reviews.review_title: This is the worst company ever.
list_of_reviews.review: This is the worst company ever.I contact them via chat they never reply but they say they opened a ticket.I talked with them via email, replying to them and the next morning they sent an email saying that they never hear back from me in the previous 72 hours, while it was the opposite and I was waiting for their answer. By the way, the 72 hours never passed.I am going to contact the European Consumer Centre for obtaining my bonuses

list_of_reviews.review_title: Unreliable crypto exchange with poor customer service
list_of_reviews.review: Do not trust this crypto exchange. Without any form of warning, it is no longer possible to claim rewards already earned with crypto staking. They simply disable the feature and refuse to find a solution to pay out my earned tokens. Customer service does not answer your questions. No solution is offered. Wondering why the authorities aren't investigating this yet.

I opened an account a few months ago and made a small deposit to activate it.I went through the KYC process a few times, and it wouldn't go through (it seemed to be automated online).After sending many emails, I received finally a reply that my account was not approved. Ok, fine, please send me back my money.Since then: no reply. They send me spam daily (impossible to opt out), but not a single reply to my dozen request to return my money.So as far as I am concerned, this is a scam site. They can refuse your application or just close your account and they will not answer any refund request.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Watch out from Trading bots; they may not exactly do what you expect...
list_of_reviews.review: Been a user of KuCoin for a long time, unfortunately I am starting to doubt the reliability of the future's bot. I had a VRA entry of 0.0073 and set the tp to 0.008222; the service indicates it was tp'd, however, the price never reached that area and my bot was closed; It happened 3 times already with similar issues and customer service is not being very useful or knowing how to help. Bot ID: 1452428525692232

Just f****** fantastic!!!! KuCoin has grown on me hard and I am kicking myself for leaving it until now, to fully immerse my time in the experience KuCoin has to offer. All the parts that are enjoyed amongst different exchanges, have been brought together for a more complete trading platform. No issues for me thus far... The challenging thing though is to navigate your way through the fully loaded platform which takes some time. Effort + Efficiency = $$$$$$Keep it up there humans!!! Please don't be in the news soon with legal issues. My heart will be broken.

Ok, fine, please send me back my money.Since then: no reply. They send me spam daily (impossible to opt out), but not a single reply to my dozen request to return my money.So as far as I am concerned, this is a scam site. They can refuse your application or just close your account and they will not answer any refund request.

Please don't be in the news soon with legal issues. My heart will be broken.
